channel.title: Server hoster needed!
channel.description:
[center][size=30pt]B1urScap3 Hoster Needed!!![/size][/center]
[b][glow=yellow,2,300]Hello[/glow][/b] [b][i]future hoster,[/i][/b]
[b][glow=yellow,2,300]Ive have posted this thread because I am need of a Hoster for my server. The server is B1urScap3;[/glow][/b]
[b][i]Click[/i][/b] [url=http://blurscapeforums.smfforfree2.com/index.php][b][u]here[/u][/b][/url] [b][i]to view B1urScap3 forums[/i][/b]
[b][i]Click[/i][/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,81527.0.html][u][b]here[/b][/u][/url] [b][i]to view B1urScap3 forum post[/i][/b]
[b][i]Click[/i][/b] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/b1ur][b][u]here[/u][/b][/url] [b][i]to view B1urScap3's website[/i][/b]
[glow=purple,2,300][b]Table of Contents:[/b][/glow]
[b]Ch.1 [/b] [glow=yellow,2,300]~[/glow] [glow=red,2,300]Hosting[/glow] [b]Ch.2[/b] [glow=yellow,2,300]~[/glow] [glow=red,2,300]Why I Need A Hoster[/glow] [b]Ch.3 [/b] [glow=yellow,2,300]~[/glow] [glow=red,2,300]How To Become A Candidate[/glow]
[b][glow=red,2,300]Hosting:[/glow][/b] [b] You must realize being the hoster of my server is a huge responsibility.[/b] [b]A hoster is someone who will be in charge of my server while im not there.[/b] [b]If you are chosen who will be 2nd ranked on my server, after the owner (me), you will have all the perks of adminship and some, and you will have the pride of hosting a great server.[/b] ;) [b]It is a very big title and requires great responsibility.[/b]
[glow=red,2,300][b]Why I Need A Hoster:[/b][/glow] [b]I need a hoster because Im not online enough (between homework, sports, and school). Its not fair to the people who really enjoy the server to only get to play it every other day or so. So thats why I need someone responsible to take over every now and then.[/b]
[glow=red,2,300][b]How to Become A Candidate:[/b][/glow] [b]To become a candidate you must post your resume here.[/b] [b]A resume is like all the things you done in the past, etc. Like wat servers you mod in, how responsible you are, just prove to me you can host my server.[/b] [b]I will choose the one I think is the best suited for the part.[/b]
[center][size=30pt]Start Posting you Resumes!!! Good Luck!!!!!!![/size][/center]

item.title: Server hoster needed!
item.dc:creator: @CRIPZ_Chick CRIPZ Chick
item.description:
@CRIPZ_Chick wrote:

I can host your server i am proud admin of :: Sanderscape, Pure4lifscape, Ownagepkscape,Owner of bewbscape,jonsmodscape, and much more but i aint payin you a single penny to host it. I aint a stupid tard taht would pay you to host your server your supposed to pay me but i am not askin for money i’d rather play on da other serverz wich i am admin/mod/owner of If i have to pay you to host your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Server hoster needed!
item.dc:creator: @XxXB1urXxX XxXB1urXxX
item.description:
@XxXB1urXxX wrote:

[center][size=30pt]B1urScap3 Hoster Needed!!![/size][/center]

[glow=yellow,2,300]Hello[/glow] future hoster,

[glow=yellow,2,300]Ive have posted this thread because I am need of a Hoster for my server. The server is B1urScap3;[/glow]

Click here to view B1urScap3 forums

Click here to view B1urScap3 forum post

Click here to view B1urScap3’s website

[glow=purple,2,300]Table of Contents:[/glow]

Ch.1 [glow=yellow,2,300]~[/glow] [glow=red,2,300]Hosting[/glow]
Ch.2 [glow=yellow,2,300]~[/glow] [glow=red,2,300]Why I Need A Hoster[/glow]
Ch.3 [glow=yellow,2,300]~[/glow] [glow=red,2,300]How To Become A Candidate[/glow]

[glow=red,2,300]Hosting:[/glow] You must realize being the hoster of my server is a huge responsibility. A hoster is someone who will be in charge of my server while im not there. If you are chosen who will be 2nd ranked on my server, after the owner (me), you will have all the perks of adminship and some, and you will have the pride of hosting a great server. It is a very big title and requires great responsibility.

[glow=red,2,300]Why I Need A Hoster:[/glow] I need a hoster because Im not online enough (between homework, sports, and school). Its not fair to the people who really enjoy the server to only get to play it every other day or so. So thats why I need someone responsible to take over every now and then.

[glow=red,2,300]How to Become A Candidate:[/glow] To become a candidate you must post your resume here. A resume is like all the things you done in the past, etc. Like wat servers you mod in, how responsible you are, just prove to me you can host my server. I will choose the one I think is the best suited for the part.

[center][size=30pt]Start Posting you Resumes!!! Good Luck!!![/size][/center]

Read full topic
